metadata.title: CVE-2018-5158 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
The PDF viewer does not sufficiently sanitize PostScript calculatorfunctions, allowing malicious JavaScript to be injected through a craftedPDF file. This JavaScript can then be run with the permissions of the PDFviewer by its worker. This vulnerability affects Firefox ESR < 52.8 andFirefox < 60.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-5158` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

firefox - 60.0+build2-0ubuntu1
firefox-globalmenu - 60.0+build2-0ubuntu1
firefox-mozsymbols - 60.0+build2-0ubuntu1
firefox-testsuite - 60.0+build2-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: firefox package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '60.0+build2-0ubuntu1').
